mapper.update: update cqwu_theoryCourse set institutionsCode = #{value} where institutionsCode=#{key}
update cqwu_openCourseSchedule set institutionCode = #{value} where institutionCode=#{key}
update cqwu_publicOptionalCourse set institutionCode = #{value} where institutionCode=#{key}
update cqwu_selectCourseTotal set institutionCode = #{value} where institutionCode=#{key}
